document.full_text: ecuadoreans were to vote on saturday over a reform package president rafael correa's rivals say would give the leftist leader too much power over courts and media critics in the south american opec member nation.
document.title: ecuador referendum likely to boost correa's power
lines_and_colors: ecuadoreans were to vote on saturday over a reform package president rafael correa's rivals say would give the leftist leader too much power over courts and media critics in the south american opec member nation.
